text:
[Verse]
Walking down the street
Rain so warm and sweet
Puddles at my feet
Rhythm in the beat

[Verse 2]
Clouds they start to cry
Tears fall from the sky
You and I walk by
Laughter flying high

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the joy and pain
Every drop the same
Calling out your name

[Verse 3]
No umbrella here
Just our love so clear
Whispers in my ear
Nothing left to fear

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the joy and pain
Every drop the same
Calling out your name

[Bridge]
Water in our hair
Love is in the air
Step without a care
Go anywhere
title: Walking in the Rain
